title: Crescent Point to sell Uinta Basin, some Saskatchewan assets for C$912 million - Nasdaq.com
text: Sept 3 (Reuters) - Crescent Point Energy Corp  said on Tuesday it has agreed to divest its Uinta Basin assets and parts of its assets in Saskatchewan for a total of about C$912 million ($687.01 million).
The Canadian oil and gas producer said it is selling the Uinta Basin asset, which was put up for sale in the first quarter, to a private operator for about C$700 million in cash.
